name: NewBrunswickToday
0:
”Alexa, open New Brunswick Today”
”Alexa, ask New Brunswick Today for the latest update”
”Alexa, start New Brunswick Today”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: new brunswick today
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to the latest news from New Brunswick Today.
You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
